com.aevi.helpers.services

Class AeviServiceProvider<T extends AeviService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.services.AeviServiceProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class of the service the service provider is providing
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrashLogServiceProvider, LedServiceProvider, MagStripeServiceProvider, MailServiceProvider, PrintServiceProvider, SharedPreferencesServiceProvider, SmartCardServiceProvider, SystemBarServiceProvider, TransactionLogServiceProvider

    public abstract class AeviServiceProvider<T extends AeviService>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Base class for service providers of AeviService. Provides general functionality such as connecting to and closing a service.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AeviServiceProvider(android.content.Context context)
      Create a new instance of a AeviServiceProvider with the given context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Disconnects the underlying service.
      void connect(AeviServiceConnectionCallback<T> connectionCallback)
      Connects this AeviServiceProvider and binds the underlying service.
      static java.lang.String getServicesName(java.lang.Class<? extends AeviService> serviceClass)
      Method for determining the name of a given service class.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AeviServiceProvider

        public AeviServiceProvider(android.content.Context context)
        Create a new instance of a AeviServiceProvider with the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to bind the service to. This parameter must not be null.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(AeviServiceConnectionCallback<T> connectionCallback)
        Connects this AeviServiceProvider and binds the underlying service. if the underlying service can not be bound, the service returned via the connectionCallback will be null.
        Parameters:
        connectionCallback - the object to call after a successful connection has been made. This parameter must not be null.

      • close

        public void close()
        Disconnects the underlying service.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • getServicesName

        public static java.lang.String getServicesName(java.lang.Class<? extends AeviService> serviceClass)
        Method for determining the name of a given service class. This name is used for the action name of the services
        Parameters:
        serviceClass - the class of the service
        Returns:
        the name belonging to the given service class
